value.stringValue: Your Payment is Now Late - KSA Events

Your Payment is Now Late - KSA Events
Your Payment is Now Late - KSA Events

formulas.name: balancePlusLateFeeFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!Get_Invoice_3_Days.Id} != null, {!latePaymentAmount}+{!Get_Invoice_3_Days.fw1__Balance_Due__c}, IF({!GetInvoice10Days.Id} != null, {!latePaymentAmount}+{!GetInvoice10Days.fw1__Balance_Due__c}, IF({!GetInvoice15Days.Id} != null, {!latePaymentAmount}+{!GetInvoice15Days.fw1__Balance_Due__c}, IF({!GetInvoice19Days.Id} != null, {!latePaymentAmount}+{!GetInvoice19Days.fw1__Balance_Due__c}, IF({!GetInvoice22Days.Id} != null, {!latePaymentAmount}+{!GetInvoice22Days.fw1__Balance_Due__c}, {!latePaymentAmount}+{!$Record.fw1__Balance_Due__c})))))

formulas.name: lateDateFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!Get_Invoice_3_Days.Id} != null, {!Get_Invoice_3_Days.fw1__Due_Date__c}+21, IF({!GetInvoice10Days.Id} != null, {!GetInvoice10Days.fw1__Due_Date__c}+21, IF({!GetInvoice15Days.Id} != null, {!GetInvoice15Days.fw1__Due_Date__c}+21, IF({!GetInvoice19Days.Id} != null, {!GetInvoice19Days.fw1__Due_Date__c}+21, IF({!GetInvoice22Days.Id} != null, {!GetInvoice22Days.fw1__Due_Date__c}+21, {!$Record.fw1__Due_Date__c}+21)))))

formulas.name: todayMinusDueDate
formulas.expression: IF({!Get_Invoice_3_Days.Id} != null, TODAY()-{!Get_Invoice_3_Days.fw1__Due_Date__c}, IF({!GetInvoice10Days.Id} != null, TODAY()-{!GetInvoice10Days.fw1__Due_Date__c}, IF({!GetInvoice15Days.Id} != null, TODAY()-{!GetInvoice15Days.fw1__Due_Date__c}, IF({!GetInvoice19Days.Id} != null, TODAY()-{!GetInvoice19Days.fw1__Due_Date__c}, IF({!GetInvoice22Days.Id} != null, TODAY()-{!GetInvoice22Days.fw1__Due_Date__c}, TODAY()-{!$Record.fw1__Due_Date__c})))))

textTemplates.name: X10DaysLateTemplate
textTemplates.text:
{!$Record.fw1__Opportunity__r.School_Contact__r.FirstName}, 



You are currently 10 days late on your payment. You still have a balance of ${!GetInvoice10Days.fw1__Balance_Due__c}..


If you do not pay ${!GetInvoice10Days.fw1__Balance_Due__c}. before {!lateDateFormula}, you will be charged a late fee of {!latePaymentAmount}. Late Payments will be applied at 12:00 AM EST on {!lateDateFormula}.


Please pay your balance as soon as possible to ensure you can attend the event.




PAY HERE NOW!

﻿



Thank you,


KSA Events




School Name: {!$Record.fw1__Opportunity__r.Account.Name}

Name: {!$Record.fw1__Opportunity__r.School_Contact__r.FirstName} {!$Record.fw1__Opportunity__r.School_Contact__r.LastName}

Email: {!$Record.fw1__Opportunity__r.School_Contact__r.Email}

Invoice #: {!$Record.Name}

Sport: {!$Record.fw1__Opportunity__r.KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c}

textTemplates.name: X15DaysLateFormula
textTemplates.text:
{!$Record.fw1__Opportunity__r.School_Contact__r.FirstName}, 



You are currently 15 days late on your payment. You still have a balance of ${!GetInvoice15Days.fw1__Balance_Due__c}.



You may miss out on attending the event and we cannot secure your registration without full payment.



If you do not pay ${!GetInvoice15Days.fw1__Balance_Due__c}. before {!lateDateFormula}, you will be charged a late fee of {!latePaymentAmount}. Late Payments will be applied at 12:00 AM EST on {!lateDateFormula}.



Please pay your balance as soon as possible to ensure you can attend the event.



PAY HERE NOW!



Thank you,


KSA Events

textTemplates.name: X19DaysLateTemplate
textTemplates.text:
{!$Record.fw1__Opportunity__r.School_Contact__r.FirstName}, 



You are currently 19 days late on your payment. You still have a balance of ${!GetInvoice19Days.fw1__Balance_Due__c}.



YOU NOW ONLY HAVE 3 DAYS BEFORE LATE FEES ARE ADDED TO YOUR INVOICE!



If you do not pay ${!GetInvoice19Days.fw1__Balance_Due__c}. before {!lateDateFormula}, you will be charged a late fee of {!latePaymentAmount}. Late Payments will be applied at 12:00 AM EST on {!lateDateFormula}.



Please pay your balance as soon as possible to ensure you can attend the event.




PAY HERE NOW!



Thank you,


KSA Events

textTemplates.name: X22DaysLateTemplate
textTemplates.text:
not



{!$Record.fw1__Opportunity__r.School_Contact__r.FirstName}, 



YOUR PAYMENT IS NOW LATE!



You are currently 22 days late on your payment. You still have a balance of {!balancePlusLateFeeFormula}.


You did not pay ${!GetInvoice22Days.fw1__Balance_Due__c} by {!lateDateFormula}, and have incurred a late fee charge of {!latePaymentAmount}. Late Payments will be applied at 12:00 AM EST on {!lateDateFormula}.




Please pay your balance IMMEDIATELY to ensure you can attend the event.




PAY HERE NOW!




Thank you,


KSA Events

{!$Record.fw1__Opportunity__r.School_Contact__r.FirstName}, 



You are currently 3 days late on your payment. You still have a balance of ${!Get_Invoice_3_Days.fw1__Balance_Due__c}.


If you do not pay $${!Get_Invoice_3_Days.fw1__Balance_Due__c} before {!lateDateFormula}, you will be charged a late fee of {!latePaymentAmount}. Late Payments will be applied at 12:00 AM EST on {!lateDateFormula}.



Please pay your balance as soon as possible to ensure you can attend the event.



PAY HERE NOW!

﻿
